Attributes.title: The page layout is displayed incorrectly in the Trading Instruments widget when opening the search and reloading the page
Attributes.steps: 1.Navigete to capital.com 2.Choose CYSEC license 3.Select language: DE 4.Scroll the page to the Trading Instruments Widget section 5.Tap in the search field ,enter something and close it 6.Reload page
Attributes.ExpectedResult: The site page is displayed correctly after reloading
Attributes.ActualResult: Page layout is crooked after reload
